question: Registers used for communication in SCREEN function
Description of SCREEN function
answer: This routine returns the format of the screen, e.g., 40 columns in X and 25 lines in Y.

question: Machine compatibility feature of SCREEN function
answer: This function has been implemented on the Commodore 64 to help upward compatibility of your programs.

question: Example of using SCREEN function
answer: JSR SCREEN STX MAXCOL STY MAXROW
